TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.Threading.Tasks.Task<bool> ShouldTransferCallbackAsync(object source, object destination);
.class public auto ansi sealed ShouldTransferCallbackAsync extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function ShouldTransferCallbackAsync(source As Object, destination As Object) As Task(Of Boolean)
type ShouldTransferCallbackAsync = delegate of obj * obj -> Task<bool>

Docs.summary: Callback invoked to tell whether a transfer should be done.
Docs.returns: True if the transfer should be done; otherwise false.
